page.title: 19BOWNESS-ON-SOLWAY. MEDIA.
page.content: Parish Council produces a quarterly newsletter, written and delivered by councillors. The June 1985 issue dealt with a memorial to Dr. McDonald who died after 36 years practice in the area; community advisers to help with peace-time disasters; transport to health service facilities. A Church and Parish monthly magazine produced by volunteers, has a letter from the Rector, a diary of local events, details of Anglican, Methodist and Catholic service times, and information contributed by local advertisers. This Magazine, along with Radio Cumbria-the local radio station, and the "Cumberland News"- the local weekly newspaper, is used to report on and advertise local happenings.
